choices.B: A certificate issue; verify and correct the certificate attributes
choices.D: An organization name issue; verify and correct the configuration on the devices
choices.A: A connectivity issue; verify and resolve the reachability to the controller
choices.C: An IPsec issue; verify and resolve the tunnel configurations on devices

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Answer is D. Error code CTORGNMMIS refers to org mismatch.

https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/routers/sd-wan/214509-troubleshoot-control-connections.html#toc-hId--953593367

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. Which issue is shown, and which action must an engineer take to resolve the issue?
How is a TLOC uniquely identified from a WAN Edge router to the SD-WAN transport network?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C) System IP Address is the right answer. System IP is the unique id of an SD-WAN Edge device in the SD-WAN fabric.

questions.question_text: A network administrator is configuring a WAN Edge router with two WAN connections and two TLOCs Which two attributes of TLOCs must be configured? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
Right answer is C & E. TLOC = System IP Address + Encapsulation (IPSec / GRE etc.) + Color (MPLS / Biz-Internet / Public-Internet etc.)

Selected Answer: CE
Answer is C&E. All TLOC's contain a System IP, Color and Encapsulation.

questions.question_text: Two spoke sites are connected to a single Cisco SD-WAN hub site. Which two features are required to configure dynamic tunnels between the two spoke sites? (Choose two.)

choices.B: a control policy with the tloc-action backup command on the spokes
choices.A: a control policy with the tloc-action backup command on the hub
choices.E: the tloc-list command on the interface of the spokes
choices.D: traffic engineering service on the hub
choices.C: traffic engineering service on the spokes
Cisco AMP and AMP Threat Grid

questions.question_text: Which two features must an engineer consider while selecting the ISR1K with 4 Gb of memory for branches? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
Only B and C are present on the router itself and require UTD engine. A - Enterprise Firewall is not the same as Zone Based Firewall I would say and means a separate box.
